Summary: We saw a light thought it was plane looked closer and it was statinary in a cleared area
divs: Sighting DetailsOre Bank road we were sitting there talking when I noticed two lights in the sky My boyfriend said it was a plane but when I look back 4 to6 minutes latter it was still there that is when we noticed it was on the ground it was pyramid shaped with a light at each tip and they changed from red to gold to blue it was huge,It didn't dawn on me of what I had saw for about 30 minutes
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hickory Grove
This sighting has never been favorited.
